english.segment1: I used to close my eyes and pray the time would pass me by. So I could fly away in my dreams to anywhere unreal. And I'd hide away from everything. I didn't know what was real, I didn't know the truth. There was a day when somebody introduced me to You. And You breathed Your life in me. You set me free..
english.segment2: [Refrain:]. Now I'll shout it from a mountain. That I'm not the same that I used to be. I believe in God, believe in God. I'm not ashamed to talk about it. To a world that slowly slips away. That I believe in God, believe in God
english.segment3: Now at the end of the day when nothing seems to go my way. I've got a friend, I've got a life that's never gonna let me go. Since You gave Your life for me. You set me free..
english.segment5: Oh, when I feel so alone. He comes to sweetly say. It's all gonna be okay. Oh, when my emotions flow. He comes to sweetly say. It's all gonna be okay
